Explanation.name: vehicle terrain parameters
Explanation.description: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

Real.name: ground friction scale
Real.description: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

Real.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
Real.description: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

Real.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
Real.description: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

Real.name: ground depth scale
Real.description: depth a point mass rests in the ground

Real.name: ground damp fraction scale
Real.description: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick
